name: Planet Waves
description:
An arcade tower defense about protecting a small planet made for the gotm.io jam #3 This one is a quite simple game. Still, I hope you enjoy playing it even if a little bit! Controls: MousePlace towersA/D or ⬅/➡Rotate the planetNumber keys (1,2,3,4)Hotkeys for selecting towers;NHides/unhides the structures panelMMutes/unmutes the game Credits:
  • Design, coding, some of the sfx: Delta-key (me);
  • Sprites, design, playtesting: Sucraiso
  • Software:
    • Godot Engine v3.2.2 stable official;
    • Libresprite/Aseprite;
    • Jxfr;
    • Audacity 2.4.1;
  • Assets:
    • Sucraiso, the towers and enemy;
    • Adam Saltsman, Abandonauts tileset;
    • VECTORPIXELSTAR, 1-bit icons;
    • Juhani Junkala, music;
    • Kenney, most of the SFX and particle textures;
    • Daniel Linssen, fonts;
  • Palette: Made with coolors.co
